00027 class BaseFilteredIterator : public Base{

00031 public:

00033     origIterator(orig) {}
00034 
00035   virtual ~BaseFilteredIterator() {}
00036 
00037   virtual const Argument& getNextPosition() const { return origIterator->getNextPosition(); }
00038 
00039   virtual void jumpTo(const Argument& pos) { origIterator->jumpTo(pos); }
00040 
00041   virtual void jumpToBegin() { origIterator->jumpToBegin(); }
00042 
00043   virtual void iterateTo(const Argument& pos) { origIterator->iterateTo(pos); }
00044 
00045   virtual void next() { origIterator->next(); }
00046 
00047   virtual bool inRange() const { return origIterator->inRange(); }
00048 
00049   virtual bool hasNext() const { return origIterator->hasNext(); }

00092 template<template <class Key, class Value, class Pair, class Iterator> class Interpolator>
00093 class TimeMappingIterator:public MappingIterator {
00094 protected:
00096   typedef std::map<simtime_t, double> MapType;
00097 
00099   typedef typename InterpolateableMap<simtime_t, double,
00100                  Interpolator<simtime_t, double,
00101                       MapType::value_type,
00102                       MapType::const_iterator> >::intpl_iterator IteratorType;
00103 
00105   IteratorType valueIt;
00106 
00108   Argument position;
00109 
00111   Argument nextPosition;
00112 
00113   bool isStepMapping;
00114 
00115   bool atPreStep;
00116 protected:
00117   void updateNextPos(){
00118     simtime_t t = valueIt.getNextPosition();
00119     if(isStepMapping && !atPreStep){
00120       t.setRaw(t.raw() - 1);
00121     }
00122     nextPosition.setTime(t);
00123   }
00124 public:
00125 
00129   TimeMappingIterator(IteratorType it, bool isStepMapping):
00130     valueIt(it), isStepMapping(isStepMapping), atPreStep(false) {
00131 
00132     position.setTime(valueIt.getPosition());
00133     updateNextPos();
00134   }
00135 
00143   void jumpTo(const Argument& pos) {
00144     atPreStep = false;
00145     valueIt.jumpTo(pos.getTime());
00146     position.setTime(pos.getTime());
00147     nextPosition.setTime(valueIt.getNextPosition());
00148   }
00149 
00161   void iterateTo(const Argument& pos) {
00162     atPreStep = false;
00163     valueIt.iterateTo(pos.getTime());
00164     position.setTime(pos.getTime());
00165     nextPosition.setTime(valueIt.getNextPosition());
00166   }
00167 
00176   virtual void next() {
00177     if(isStepMapping && !atPreStep){
00178       valueIt.iterateTo(nextPosition.getTime());
00179       atPreStep = true;
00180     } else {
00181       valueIt.next();
00182       atPreStep = false;
00183     }
00184     position.setTime(valueIt.getPosition());
00185     updateNextPos();
00186   }
00187 
00197   virtual bool inRange() const {
00198     return valueIt.inRange();
00199   }
00200 
00206   virtual const Argument& getPosition() const {
00207     return position;
00208   }
00209 
00215   virtual const Argument& getNextPosition() const {
00216     return nextPosition;
00217   }
00218 
00225   virtual double getValue() const {
00226     return *valueIt.getValue();
00227   }
00228 
00237   virtual void jumpToBegin() {
00238     valueIt.jumpToBegin();
00239     position.setTime(valueIt.getPosition());
00240   }
00241 
00248     virtual bool hasNext() const {
00249       return valueIt.hasNext();
00250     }
00251 
00258   virtual void setValue(double value) {
00259     valueIt.setValue(value);
00260   }
00261 };

00271 template<template <class Key, class Value, class Pair, class Iterator> class Interpolator>
00272 class TimeMapping:public Mapping {
00273 protected:
00275   typedef std::map<simtime_t, double> MapType;
00276 
00278   typedef InterpolateableMap<simtime_t, double,
00279                  Interpolator<simtime_t, double,
00280                       MapType::value_type,
00281                       MapType::const_iterator> > ValueMap;
00282 
00284   ValueMap entries;
00285 
00294   bool isStepMapping;
00295 public:
00296 
00300   TimeMapping(InterpolationMethod intpl = LINEAR):
00301     Mapping(), entries(), isStepMapping(intpl == STEPS) {}
00302 
00306   TimeMapping(double outOfRangeVal, InterpolationMethod intpl = LINEAR):
00307     Mapping(), entries(outOfRangeVal), isStepMapping(intpl == STEPS) {}
00308 
00312   virtual Mapping* clone() const { return new TimeMapping<Interpolator>(*this); }
00313 
00320   virtual double getValue(const Argument& pos) const {
00321     return *entries.getIntplValue(pos.getTime());
00322   }
00323 
00330   virtual void setValue(const Argument& pos, double value) {
00331     entries[pos.getTime()] = value;
00332   }
00333 
00341   virtual MappingIterator* createIterator() {
00342     return new TimeMappingIterator<Interpolator>(entries.beginIntpl(), isStepMapping);
00343   }
00344 
00352   virtual MappingIterator* createIterator(const Argument& pos) {
00353     return new TimeMappingIterator<Interpolator>(entries.findIntpl(pos.getTime()), isStepMapping);
00354   }

00366 class LinearIntplMappingIterator:public MappingIterator {
00367 protected:
00369   ConstMappingIterator* leftIt;
00371   ConstMappingIterator* rightIt;
00372 
00375   double factor;
00376 
00377 public:
00382   LinearIntplMappingIterator(ConstMappingIterator* leftIt, ConstMappingIterator* rightIt, double f);
00383 
00387   virtual ~LinearIntplMappingIterator();
00388 
00394   virtual bool hasNext() const { return false; }
00400   virtual bool inRange() const { return false; }
00401 
00405   virtual void jumpToBegin() { assert(false); }
00409   virtual void next() { assert(false); }
00410 
00414   virtual void setValue(double value) { assert(false); }
00415 
00422   virtual void jumpTo(const Argument& pos){
00423     leftIt->jumpTo(pos);
00424     rightIt->jumpTo(pos);
00425   }
00426 
00438   virtual void iterateTo(const Argument& pos){
00439     leftIt->iterateTo(pos);
00440     rightIt->iterateTo(pos);
00441   }
00442 
00449   virtual double getValue() const {
00450     double v0 = leftIt->getValue();
00451     double v1 = rightIt->getValue();
00452     return v0 + (v1 - v0) * factor;
00453   }
00454 
00460   virtual const Argument& getPosition() const {
00461     return leftIt->getPosition();
00462   }
00463 
00467   virtual const Argument& getNextPosition() const { assert(false); }
00468 };

00477 class LinearIntplMapping:public Mapping {
00478 protected:
00480   ConstMapping* left;
00482   ConstMapping* right;
00483 
00486   double factor;
00487 
00488 public:
00489 
00494   LinearIntplMapping(ConstMapping* left = 0, ConstMapping* right = 0, double f = 0.0):
00495     left(left), right(right), factor(f) {}
00496 
00500   virtual Mapping* clone() const{ assert(false); return 0; }
00501 
00509   virtual double getValue(const Argument& pos) const {
00510     assert(left);
00511     assert(right);
00512 
00513     double v0 = left->getValue(pos);
00514     double v1 = right->getValue(pos);
00515     return v0 + (v1 - v0) * factor;
00516   }
00517 
00522   virtual MappingIterator* createIterator() {
00523     assert(false);
00524     return 0;
00525   }
00526 
00535   virtual MappingIterator* createIterator(const Argument& pos) {
00536     assert(left);
00537     assert(right);
00538 
00539     return new LinearIntplMappingIterator(left->createConstIterator(pos), right->createConstIterator(pos), factor);
00540   }
00541 
00545   virtual void setValue(const Argument& pos, double value) { assert(false); }
00546 };

00559 template<>
00560 class Interpolated<Mapping*> {
00561 protected:
00563   LinearIntplMapping mapping;
00564 
00566   Mapping* value;
00567 
00569   bool isPointer;
00570 public:
00572   bool isInterpolated;
00573 
00574 public:
00580   Interpolated(const LinearIntplMapping& m):
00581     mapping(m), isPointer(false), isInterpolated(true) {
00582 
00583     value = &mapping;
00584   }
00585 
00592   Interpolated(Mapping* m, bool isIntpl = true):
00593     mapping(), value(m), isPointer(true), isInterpolated(isIntpl) {}
00594 
00598   Interpolated(const Interpolated<Mapping*>& o):
00599     mapping() {
00600 
00601     isInterpolated = o.isInterpolated;
00602     isPointer = o.isPointer;
00603     if(isPointer){
00604       value = o.value;
00605     } else {
00606       mapping = o.mapping;
00607       value = &mapping;
00608     }
00609   }
00610 
00615   const Interpolated<Mapping*>& operator=(const Interpolated<Mapping*>& o){
00616     isInterpolated = o.isInterpolated;
00617     isPointer = o.isPointer;
00618     if(isPointer){
00619       value = o.value;
00620     } else {
00621       mapping = o.mapping;
00622       value = &mapping;
00623     }
00624     return *this;
00625   }
00626 
00631   Mapping*& operator*() {
00632     return value;
00633   }
00634 
00639   Mapping** operator->() {
00640     return &value;
00641   }
00642 
00648   bool operator==(const Interpolated<Mapping*>& other) {
00649     return value == other.value && isInterpolated == other.isInterpolated;
00650   }
00651 
00657   bool operator!=(const Interpolated<Mapping*>& other) {
00658     return value != other.value || isInterpolated != other.isInterpolated;
00659   }
00660 };

00669 template<>
00670 class Linear<double, Mapping*, std::map<double, Mapping*>::value_type, std::map<double, Mapping*>::const_iterator> {
00671 public:
00673   typedef std::map<double, Mapping*>::const_iterator InputIterator;
00674 
00676   typedef Interpolated<Mapping*> interpolated;
00677 protected:
00678 
00680   PairLess<std::map<double, Mapping*>::value_type, double> comp;
00681 
00682 
00683   bool continueOutOfRange;
00684   Mapping* outOfRangeVal;
00685 
00686 public:
00687   Linear():
00688     continueOutOfRange(true) {}
00689 
00690   Linear(Mapping* oorv):
00691     continueOutOfRange(false), outOfRangeVal(oorv) {}
00692 
00693   void setOutOfRangeVal(Mapping* oorv) { outOfRangeVal = oorv; }
00694 
00699   static double linearInterpolationFactor(const double& t,
00700                     const double& t0, const double& t1){
00701     return (t - t0) / (t1 - t0);
00702   }
00703 
00715   interpolated operator()(const InputIterator& first,
00716               const InputIterator& last,
00717               const double& pos) const{
00718 
00719     InputIterator right = std::upper_bound(first, last, pos, comp);
00720 
00721     return operator()(first, last, pos, right);
00722   }
00723 
00738   interpolated operator()(const InputIterator& first,
00739               const InputIterator& last,
00740               const double& pos,
00741               InputIterator upperBound) const{
00742     if(first == last){
00743       if(continueOutOfRange)
00744         return interpolated(0);
00745       else
00746         return interpolated(outOfRangeVal);
00747     }
00748 
00749     if(upperBound == first){
00750       if(continueOutOfRange)
00751         return interpolated(upperBound->second);
00752       else
00753         return interpolated(outOfRangeVal);
00754     }
00755 
00756     InputIterator right = upperBound;
00757     InputIterator left = --upperBound;
00758 
00759     if(left->first == pos)
00760       return interpolated(left->second, false);
00761 
00762     if(right == last){
00763       if(continueOutOfRange)
00764         return interpolated(left->second);
00765       else
00766         return interpolated(outOfRangeVal);
00767     }
00768 
00769     double fact = linearInterpolationFactor(pos, left->first, right->first);
00770 
00771     return interpolated(LinearIntplMapping(left->second, right->second, fact));
00772   }
00773 };

00904 template<template <class Key, class Value,
00905           class Pair,
00906           class iterator> class Interpolator>
00907 class MultiDimMapping;
00908 
00928 template<template <class Key, class Value,
00929           class Pair,
00930           class iterator> class Interpolator>
00931 class MultiDimMappingIterator:public MappingIterator {
00932 protected:
00934   typedef InterpolateableMap<double, Mapping*,
00935                  Interpolator<double, Mapping*,
00936                         std::map<double, Mapping*>::value_type,
00937                         std::map<double, Mapping*>::const_iterator> > MapType;
00939   typedef typename MapType::intpl_iterator IteratorType;
00940 
00942   MultiDimMapping<Interpolator>& mapping;
00943 
00946   IteratorType valueIt;
00947 
00949   typename MapType::interpolated subMapping;
00950 
00953   MappingIterator* subIterator;
00954 
00956   Argument position;
00957 
00959   Argument nextPosition;
00960 
00961 protected:
00962 
00970   void updateSubIterator(const Argument& pos) {
00971     typename MapType::interpolated subM = valueIt.getValue();
00972     if(subM != subMapping) {
00973       if(subIterator)
00974         delete subIterator;
00975 
00976       subMapping = subM;
00977       if(*subMapping)
00978         subIterator = (*subMapping)->createIterator(pos);
00979       else
00980         subIterator = 0;
00981     } else {
00982       if(subIterator)
00983         subIterator->jumpTo(pos);
00984     }
00985   }
00986 
00994   void updateSubIterator() {
00995     typename MapType::interpolated subM = valueIt.getValue();
00996     if(subM != subMapping) {
00997       if(subIterator)
00998         delete subIterator;
00999 
01000       subMapping = subM;
01001       if(*subMapping){
01002         if(subMapping.isInterpolated)
01003           subIterator = (*subMapping)->createIterator(position);
01004         else
01005           subIterator = (*subMapping)->createIterator();
01006       }else
01007         subIterator = 0;
01008     } else {
01009       if(subIterator)
01010         subIterator->jumpToBegin();
01011     }
01012   }
01013 
01019   void updateNextPosition(){
01020     bool intp = subMapping.isInterpolated;
01021 
01022     bool noSubIt = false;
01023     bool hasNoNext = false;
01024     if(!intp){
01025       noSubIt = !subIterator;
01026       if(!noSubIt)
01027         hasNoNext = !subIterator->hasNext();
01028     }
01029     if(intp || noSubIt || hasNoNext){
01030       if(valueIt.hasNext()){
01031         ConstMappingIterator* tmp = (*valueIt.getNextValue())->createConstIterator();
01032         nextPosition.setArgValues(tmp->getPosition());
01033         delete tmp;
01034       }else{
01035         nextPosition = position;
01036       }
01037       nextPosition.setArgValue(mapping.myDimension, valueIt.getNextPosition());
01038 
01039     } else {
01040       nextPosition.setArgValues(subIterator->getNextPosition());
01041     }
01042   }
01043 
01044 public:
01049   MultiDimMappingIterator(MultiDimMapping<Interpolator>& mapping):
01050     mapping(mapping),
01051     valueIt(mapping.entries.beginIntpl()),
01052     subMapping(0), subIterator(0),
01053     position(){
01054 
01055     subMapping = valueIt.getValue();
01056     if(!subMapping.isInterpolated && *subMapping) {
01057       subIterator = (*subMapping)->createIterator();
01058       position = subIterator->getPosition();
01059       position.setArgValue(mapping.myDimension, valueIt.getPosition());
01060     } else {
01061       position = Argument(mapping.dimensions);
01062     }
01063     nextPosition = position;
01064 
01065     updateNextPosition();
01066   }
01067 
01072   MultiDimMappingIterator(MultiDimMapping<Interpolator>& mapping, const Argument& pos):
01073     mapping(mapping),
01074     valueIt(mapping.entries.findIntpl(pos.getArgValue(mapping.myDimension))),
01075     subMapping(0), subIterator(0),
01076     position(){
01077 
01078     subMapping = valueIt.getValue();
01079     if(*subMapping){
01080       subIterator = (*subMapping)->createIterator(pos);
01081     }
01082 
01083     position = pos;
01084     nextPosition = position;
01085     updateNextPosition();
01086 
01087   }
01088 
01092   virtual ~MultiDimMappingIterator() {
01093     if(subIterator)
01094       delete subIterator;
01095   }
01096 
01105     void jumpTo(const Argument& pos){
01106     double argVal = pos.getArgValue(mapping.myDimension);
01107 
01108     if(argVal != valueIt.getPosition() && pos.hasArgVal(mapping.myDimension)) {
01109       valueIt.jumpTo(argVal);
01110       updateSubIterator(pos);
01111     } else {
01112       if(subIterator)
01113         subIterator->jumpTo(pos);
01114     }
01115 
01116     position.setArgValues(pos);
01117     nextPosition.setArgValues(position);
01118     updateNextPosition();
01119   }
01120 
01131   void iterateTo(const Argument& pos){
01132     double argVal = pos.getArgValue(mapping.myDimension);
01133 
01134     if(argVal != valueIt.getPosition() && pos.hasArgVal(mapping.myDimension)) {
01135       valueIt.iterateTo(argVal);
01136       updateSubIterator(pos);
01137     } else {
01138       if(subIterator)
01139         subIterator->iterateTo(pos);
01140     }
01141 
01142     position.setArgValues(pos);
01143     updateNextPosition();
01144   }
01145 
01158   virtual void next(){
01159     if(!subMapping.isInterpolated && subIterator && subIterator->hasNext()) {
01160       subIterator->next();
01161     } else {
01162       valueIt.next();
01163       updateSubIterator();
01164     }
01165 
01166 
01167     if(subIterator)
01168       position.setArgValues(subIterator->getPosition());
01169 
01170     position.setArgValue(mapping.myDimension, valueIt.getPosition());
01171 
01172     updateNextPosition();
01173   }
01174 
01184   virtual bool inRange() const {
01185     return valueIt.inRange() && (subMapping.isInterpolated || (subIterator && subIterator->inRange()));
01186   }
01187 
01193   virtual const Argument& getPosition() const {
01194     return position;
01195   }
01196 
01202   virtual const Argument& getNextPosition() const {
01203     return nextPosition;
01204   }
01205 
01212   virtual double getValue() const {
01213     if(subIterator)
01214       return subIterator->getValue();
01215     else
01216       return 0.0;
01217   }
01218 
01227   virtual void jumpToBegin(){
01228     valueIt.jumpToBegin();
01229     updateSubIterator();
01230     if(subIterator)
01231       position.setArgValues(subIterator->getPosition());
01232 
01233     position.setArgValue(mapping.myDimension, valueIt.getPosition());
01234     updateNextPosition();
01235   }
01236 
01243     virtual bool hasNext() const {
01244       return valueIt.hasNext() or (subIterator and subIterator->hasNext() and valueIt.inRange());
01245     }
01246 
01253   virtual void setValue(double value){
01254     if(subMapping.isInterpolated) {
01255       valueIt.setValue(mapping.createSubSignal());
01256       updateSubIterator(position);
01257     }
01258     subIterator->setValue(value);
01259   }
01260 };

01279 template<template <class Key, class Value,
01280           class Pair,
01281           class iterator> class Interpolator>
01282 class MultiDimMapping:public Mapping {
01283 protected:
01285   typedef InterpolateableMap<double, Mapping*,
01286                  Interpolator<double, Mapping*,
01287                         std::map<double, Mapping*>::value_type,
01288                         std::map<double, Mapping*>::const_iterator> > SubFunctionMap;
01289 
01294   ConstantSimpleConstMapping* outOfRangeMapping;
01295 
01300   ConstMappingWrapper* wrappedOORMapping;
01301 
01303   SubFunctionMap entries;
01304 
01306   Dimension myDimension;
01307 
01308   friend class MultiDimMappingIterator<Interpolator>;
01309 
01310   bool isMaster;
01311 
01312 protected:
01321   MultiDimMapping(const DimensionSet& myDims, Dimension myDim, InterpolationMethod intpl = STEPS):
01322       Mapping(myDims),
01323       outOfRangeMapping(0),
01324       wrappedOORMapping(0),
01325       entries(),
01326       myDimension(myDim),
01327       isMaster(false) {}
01328 
01337   MultiDimMapping(const DimensionSet& myDims, Dimension myDim,
01338           ConstantSimpleConstMapping* oorm,
01339           ConstMappingWrapper* wrappedoorm,
01340           InterpolationMethod intpl = STEPS):
01341       Mapping(myDims),
01342       outOfRangeMapping(oorm),
01343       wrappedOORMapping(wrappedoorm),
01344       entries(wrappedOORMapping),
01345       myDimension(myDim),
01346       isMaster(false) {}
01347 
01352   MultiDimMapping(const MultiDimMapping<Interpolator>& o,
01353           ConstantSimpleConstMapping* oorm,
01354           ConstMappingWrapper* wrappedoorm):
01355     Mapping(o),
01356     outOfRangeMapping(oorm),
01357     wrappedOORMapping(wrappedoorm),
01358     entries(o.entries),
01359     myDimension(o.myDimension),
01360     isMaster(false){
01361 
01362     entries.setOutOfRangeVal(wrappedOORMapping);
01363 
01364     copySubMappings(o);
01365   }
01366 
01371   Mapping* createSubSignal() const{
01372     DimensionSet::const_iterator it = dimensions.find(myDimension);
01373     Dimension nextDim = *(--it);
01374     if(wrappedOORMapping == 0) {
01375       if(nextDim == Dimension::time)
01376         return new TimeMapping<Interpolator>();
01377       else
01378         return new MultiDimMapping<Interpolator>(dimensions, nextDim, LINEAR);
01379     } else {
01380       if(nextDim == Dimension::time)
01381         return new TimeMapping<Interpolator>(outOfRangeMapping->getValue());
01382       else
01383         return new MultiDimMapping<Interpolator>(dimensions, nextDim,
01384                        outOfRangeMapping,
01385                        wrappedOORMapping, LINEAR);
01386     }
01387   }
01388 
01389   void copySubMappings(const MultiDimMapping& o){
01390     DimensionSet::const_iterator dimIt = dimensions.find(myDimension);
01391     Dimension nextDim = *(--dimIt);
01392 
01393     if(nextDim == Dimension::time_static())
01394     {
01395       for(typename SubFunctionMap::iterator it = entries.begin();
01396         it != entries.end(); it++)
01397       {
01398         it->second = new TimeMapping<Interpolator>(*(static_cast<TimeMapping<Interpolator>*>(it->second)));
01399       }
01400     } else
01401     {
01402       for(typename SubFunctionMap::iterator it = entries.begin();
01403         it != entries.end(); it++)
01404       {
01405         if(outOfRangeMapping == 0) {
01406           it->second = new MultiDimMapping<Interpolator>(*(static_cast<MultiDimMapping<Interpolator>*>(it->second)));
01407         } else {
01408           it->second = new MultiDimMapping<Interpolator>(*(static_cast<MultiDimMapping<Interpolator>*>(it->second)),
01409                            outOfRangeMapping,
01410                            wrappedOORMapping);
01411         }
01412       }
01413     }
01414   }
01415 
01416 public:
01422   MultiDimMapping(const DimensionSet& myDims, InterpolationMethod intpl = STEPS):
01423     Mapping(myDims),
01424     outOfRangeMapping(0),
01425     wrappedOORMapping(0),
01426     entries(),
01427     isMaster(true){
01428 
01429     myDimension = *(dimensions.rbegin());
01430   }
01431 
01437   MultiDimMapping(const DimensionSet& myDims, double oorv, InterpolationMethod intpl = STEPS):
01438     Mapping(myDims),
01439     outOfRangeMapping(new ConstantSimpleConstMapping(myDims, oorv)),
01440     wrappedOORMapping(new ConstMappingWrapper(outOfRangeMapping)),
01441     entries(wrappedOORMapping),
01442     isMaster(true) {
01443 
01444     myDimension = *(dimensions.rbegin());
01445   }
01446 
01451   MultiDimMapping(const MultiDimMapping<Interpolator>& o):
01452     Mapping(o),
01453     outOfRangeMapping(o.outOfRangeMapping),
01454     wrappedOORMapping(o.wrappedOORMapping),
01455     entries(o.entries),
01456     myDimension(o.myDimension),
01457     isMaster(true){
01458 
01459     if(outOfRangeMapping != 0){
01460       outOfRangeMapping = new ConstantSimpleConstMapping(dimensions, o.outOfRangeMapping->getValue());
01461       wrappedOORMapping = new ConstMappingWrapper(outOfRangeMapping);
01462       entries.setOutOfRangeVal(wrappedOORMapping);
01463     }
01464 
01465 
01466     copySubMappings(o);
01467   }
01468 
01473   const MultiDimMapping& operator=(const MultiDimMapping<Interpolator>& o){
01474     for(typename SubFunctionMap::iterator it = entries.begin();
01475       it != entries.end(); it++) {
01476 
01477       if(it->second)
01478         delete it->second;
01479     }
01480 
01481     dimensions = o.dimensions;
01482     entries = o.entries;
01483     myDimension = o.myDimension;
01484     outOfRangeMapping = o.outOfRangeMapping;
01485     wrappedOORMapping = o.wrappedOORMapping;
01486     isMaster = true;
01487 
01488     if(outOfRangeMapping != 0){
01489       outOfRangeMapping = new ConstantSimpleConstMapping(dimensions, o.outOfRangeMapping->getValue());
01490       wrappedOORMapping = new ConstMappingWrapper(outOfRangeMapping);
01491       entries.setOutOfRangeVal(wrappedOORMapping);
01492     }
01493 
01494     copySubMappings(o);
01495 
01496     return *this;
01497   }
01498 
01502   virtual Mapping* clone() const { return new MultiDimMapping<Interpolator>(*this); }
01503 
01507   virtual ~MultiDimMapping() {
01508       for(typename SubFunctionMap::iterator it = entries.begin();
01509         it != entries.end(); it++) {
01510 
01511         if(it->second)
01512           delete it->second;
01513       }
01514 
01515       if(isMaster) {
01516         if(outOfRangeMapping)
01517           delete outOfRangeMapping;
01518         if(wrappedOORMapping)
01519           delete wrappedOORMapping;
01520       }
01521     }
01522 
01530   virtual double getValue(const Argument& pos) const {
01531     double argVal = pos.getArgValue(myDimension);
01532 
01533     Interpolated<Mapping*> subM = entries.getIntplValue(argVal);
01534 
01535     if(!(*subM))
01536       return double();
01537 
01538     return (*subM)->getValue(pos);
01539   }
01540 
01548   virtual void setValue(const Argument& pos, double value) {
01549     double argVal = pos.getArgValue(myDimension);
01550 
01551       typename SubFunctionMap::iterator posIt = entries.lower_bound(argVal);
01552 
01553     if(posIt == entries.end() || posIt->first != argVal) {
01554       Mapping* subF = createSubSignal();
01555         posIt = entries.insert(posIt, typename SubFunctionMap::value_type(argVal, subF));
01556       }
01557 
01558       posIt->second->setValue(pos, value);
01559   }
01560 
01568   virtual MappingIterator* createIterator() {
01569     return new MultiDimMappingIterator<Interpolator>(*this);
01570   }
01571 
01579   virtual MappingIterator* createIterator(const Argument& pos) {
01580     return new MultiDimMappingIterator<Interpolator>(*this, pos);
01581   }
01582 
01583 
01587   Dimension getDimension() { return myDimension; }
01588 };

01604 class FilledUpMappingIterator : public MultiDimMappingIterator<Linear>{
01605 public:
01606   FilledUpMappingIterator(FilledUpMapping& mapping);
01607 
01608   FilledUpMappingIterator(FilledUpMapping& mapping, const Argument& pos);
01609 
01610   virtual void setValue(double value) {
01611     assert(false);
01612   }
01613 };
01614 
01628 class FilledUpMapping : public MultiDimMapping<Linear> {
01629 //--------members----------
01630 public:
01631   typedef std::set<double> KeySet;
01632   typedef std::map<Dimension, KeySet > KeyMap;
01633 protected:
01634   Mapping* fillRef;
01635   const KeyMap* keys;
01636 
01637 //--------methods----------
01638 protected:
01639   void fillRefIfNecessary() {
01640     KeyMap::const_iterator it = keys->find(myDimension);
01641 
01642     if(it == keys->end())
01643       return;
01644 
01645     fillRef = createSubSignal();
01646 
01647     for (KeySet::const_iterator keyIt = it->second.begin();
01648        keyIt != it->second.end(); ++keyIt)
01649     {
01650       entries.insert(entries.end(), SubFunctionMap::value_type(*keyIt, fillRef));
01651     }
01652   }
01653 
01654   FilledUpMapping(const DimensionSet& myDims, Dimension myDim, const KeyMap* keys, InterpolationMethod intpl = STEPS):
01655     MultiDimMapping<Linear>(myDims, myDim, intpl), fillRef(0), keys(keys)
01656   {
01657     fillRefIfNecessary();
01658   }
01659 
01660   Mapping* createSubSignal() const{
01661     DimensionSet::const_iterator it = dimensions.find(myDimension);
01662     Dimension nextDim = *(--it);
01663     if(nextDim == Dimension::time)
01664       return new TimeMapping<Linear>();
01665     else
01666       return new FilledUpMapping(dimensions, nextDim, keys, LINEAR);
01667   }
01668 public:
01669   FilledUpMapping(ConstMapping* source, const DimensionSet& dims, const KeyMap* keys):
01670     MultiDimMapping<Linear>(dims), fillRef(0), keys(keys)
01671   {
01672     ConstMappingIterator* it = source->createConstIterator();
01673 
01674     if(it->inRange())
01675     {
01676       fillRefIfNecessary();
01677 
01678       while(it->inRange()){
01679         appendValue(it->getPosition(), it->getValue());
01680 
01681         if(!it->hasNext())
01682           break;
01683 
01684         it->next();
01685       }
01686     }
01687 
01688     delete it;
01689 
01690     keys = 0;
01691   }
01692 
01693   virtual ~FilledUpMapping(){
01694     if(fillRef != 0){
01695       delete fillRef;
01696       entries.clear();
01697     }
01698   }
01699 
01700   virtual void appendValue(const Argument& pos, double value) {
01701     assert(keys != 0);
01702 
01703     if(fillRef != 0)
01704     {
01705       fillRef->appendValue(pos, value);
01706     }
01707     else
01708     {
01709       double argVal = pos.getArgValue(myDimension);
01710 
01711       SubFunctionMap::iterator posIt = entries.lower_bound(argVal);
01712 
01713       if(posIt == entries.end() || posIt->first != argVal) {
01714         Mapping* subF = createSubSignal();
01715         posIt = entries.insert(posIt, SubFunctionMap::value_type(argVal, subF));
01716       }
01717 
01718       posIt->second->appendValue(pos, value);
01719     }
01720 
01721   }
01722 
01723   virtual MappingIterator* createIterator() {
01724     return new FilledUpMappingIterator(*this);
01725   }
01726 
01727   virtual MappingIterator* createIterator(const Argument& pos) {
01728     return new FilledUpMappingIterator(*this, pos);
01729   }
01730 };
01731 
01738 class MappingUtils {
01739 public:
01740   typedef std::list<ConstMapping*> MappingBuffer;
01741 private:
01742   static MappingBuffer mappingBuffer;
01743 
01744 private:
01745   static void freeMappingBuffer(ConstMapping* m){
01746     MappingBuffer::iterator it = std::find(mappingBuffer.begin(), mappingBuffer.end(), m);
01747     if(it != mappingBuffer.end()){
01748       delete m;
01749       mappingBuffer.erase(it);
01750     }
01751   }
01752 
01753   static ConstMapping* setMappingBuffer(ConstMapping* mapping){
01754 
01755     mappingBuffer.push_front(mapping);
01756     return mapping;
01757   }
01758 
01759   static ConstMapping* createCompatibleMapping(ConstMapping& src, ConstMapping& dst);
01760 
01761   static bool iterateToNext(ConstMappingIterator* it1, ConstMappingIterator* it2);
01762 
01763 public:
01764 
01771   static Mapping* createMapping(const DimensionSet& domain = DimensionSet(Dimension::time_static()),
01772                   Mapping::InterpolationMethod intpl = Mapping::LINEAR);
01773 
01780   static Mapping* createMapping(double outOfRangeValue,
01781                   const DimensionSet& domain = DimensionSet(Dimension::time_static()),
01782                   Mapping::InterpolationMethod intpl = Mapping::LINEAR);
01783 
01784   template<class Operator>
01785   static Mapping* applyElementWiseOperator(ConstMapping& f1, ConstMapping& f2,
01786                        const Argument& intvlStart,
01787                        const Argument& intvlEnd,
01788                        Operator op){
01789 
01790     return 0;
01791   }
01792 
01793   template<class Operator>
01794   static Mapping* applyElementWiseOperator(ConstMapping& f1, ConstMapping& f2, Operator op,
01795                        double outOfRangeVal = 0.0,
01796                        bool contOutOfRange = true){
01797     const DimensionSet& domain1 = f1.getDimensionSet();
01798 
01799     ConstMapping* f2Comp = createCompatibleMapping(f2, f1);
01800 
01801     Mapping* result = 0;
01802     if(contOutOfRange)
01803       result = MappingUtils::createMapping(domain1);
01804     else
01805       result = MappingUtils::createMapping(outOfRangeVal, domain1);
01806 
01807     ConstMappingIterator* itF1 = f1.createConstIterator();
01808     ConstMappingIterator* itF2 = f2Comp->createConstIterator();
01809 
01810     if(!itF1->inRange() && !itF2->inRange()){
01811       delete itF1;
01812       delete itF2;
01813       return result;
01814     }
01815 
01816     MappingIterator* itRes = 0;
01817 
01818     if(itF1->inRange() && (!itF2->inRange() || itF1->getPosition() < itF2->getPosition())){
01819       itF2->jumpTo(itF1->getPosition());
01820     } else {
01821       itF1->jumpTo(itF2->getPosition());
01822     }
01823 
01824     itRes = result->createIterator(itF1->getPosition());
01825 
01826     while(itF1->inRange() || itF2->inRange()) {
01827       assert(itF1->getPosition().isSamePosition(itF2->getPosition()));
01828 
01829       double prod = op(itF1->getValue(), itF2->getValue());
01830       //result->setValue(itF1->getPosition(), prod);
01831       itRes->setValue(prod);
01832 
01833       if(!iterateToNext(itF1, itF2))
01834         break;
01835 
01836       itRes->iterateTo(itF1->getPosition());
01837     }
01838 
01839     delete itF1;
01840     delete itF2;
01841     delete itRes;
01842 
01843     freeMappingBuffer(f2Comp);
01844 
01845     return result;
01846   }
01847 
01848

01861   static Mapping* subtract(ConstMapping& f1, ConstMapping& f2);
01862   static Mapping* divide(ConstMapping& f1, ConstMapping& f2);

01864   static Mapping* multiply(ConstMapping& f1, ConstMapping& f2, double outOfRangeVal);
01865   static Mapping* add(ConstMapping& f1, ConstMapping& f2, double outOfRangeVal);
01866   static Mapping* subtract(ConstMapping& f1, ConstMapping& f2, double outOfRangeVal);

01922 class ConcatConstMappingIterator : public FilteredConstMappingIterator{
01923 //--------members----------
01924 protected:
01925   ConstMapping* baseMapping;

01929     FilteredConstMappingIterator(baseMapping->createConstIterator()),

01933     FilteredConstMappingIterator(baseMapping->createConstIterator(pos)),
01934     baseMapping(baseMapping) {}

01941 
01949 template<class Operator>
01950 class ConcatConstMapping: public ConstMapping {
01951 protected:
01952   typedef std::pair<Dimension, Argument::const_iterator> DimIteratorPair;
01953   typedef std::list<ConstMapping*> MappingSet;
01954   MappingSet mappings;
01955   ConstMapping* refMapping;
01956   Operator op;
01957 
01958 public:
01963   template<class Iterator>
01964   ConcatConstMapping(ConstMapping* refMapping,
01965              Iterator first, Iterator last,
01966              Operator op = Operator()):
01967     ConstMapping(refMapping->getDimensionSet()),
01968     refMapping(refMapping), op(op)
01969   {
01970     while(first != last){
01971       mappings.push_back(*first);
01972       ++first;
01973     }
01974   }
01975 
01980   ConcatConstMapping(ConstMapping* refMapping, ConstMapping* other,
01981              Operator op = Operator()):
01982     ConstMapping(refMapping->getDimensionSet()),
01983     refMapping(refMapping), op(op)
01984   {
01985     mappings.push_back(other);
01986   }
01987 
01992   void addMapping(ConstMapping* m) {
01993     mappings.push_back(m);
01994   }
01995 
01996   virtual double getValue(const Argument& pos) const {
01997     MappingSet::const_iterator it = mappings.begin();
01998     double res = refMapping->getValue(pos);
01999 
02000     for (MappingSet::const_iterator it = mappings.begin();
02001        it != mappings.end(); ++it)
02002     {
02003       res = op(res, (*it)->getValue(pos));
02004     }
02005 
02006     return res;
02007   }
02008 
02012   Mapping* createConcatenatedMapping(){
02013     MappingSet::const_iterator it = mappings.begin();
02014 
02015     Mapping* result = MappingUtils::applyElementWiseOperator(*refMapping, **it, op);
02016 
02017     while(++it != mappings.end()){
02018       Mapping* buf = result;
02019       result = MappingUtils::applyElementWiseOperator(*buf, **it, op);
02020       delete buf;
02021     }
02022 
02023     return result;
02024   }
02025 
02026   virtual ConstMappingIterator* createConstIterator() {
02027     return new ConcatConstMappingIterator(createConcatenatedMapping());
02028   }
02029 
02030   virtual ConstMappingIterator* createConstIterator(const Argument& pos) {
02031     return new ConcatConstMappingIterator(createConcatenatedMapping(), pos);
02032   }
02033 
02034   virtual ConstMapping* constClone() const {
02035     return new ConcatConstMapping(*this);
02036   }
02037 
02041   ConstMapping* getRefMapping() {
02042     return refMapping;
02043   }
02044 };

02053 template<class Base, class Iterator>
02054 class BaseDelayedIterator: public Base {
02055 protected:
02056   simtime_t delay;
02057 
02058   Argument position;
02059   Argument nextPosition;
02060 protected:
02061   Argument undelayPosition(const Argument& pos) const{
02062     Argument res(pos);
02063     res.setTime(res.getTime() - delay);
02064     return res;
02065   }
02066 
02067   Argument delayPosition(const Argument& pos) const {
02068     Argument res(pos);
02069       res.setTime(res.getTime() + delay);
02070       return res;
02071   }
02072 
02073   void updatePosition() {
02074     nextPosition = delayPosition(this->origIterator->getNextPosition());
02075     position = delayPosition(this->origIterator->getPosition());
02076   }
02077 
02078 public:
02079   BaseDelayedIterator(Iterator* it, simtime_t delay):
02080     Base(it), delay(delay) {
02081 
02082     updatePosition();
02083   }
02084 
02085   virtual ~BaseDelayedIterator() {}
02086 
02087   virtual const Argument& getNextPosition() const { return nextPosition; }
02088 
02089   virtual void jumpTo(const Argument& pos) {
02090     this->origIterator->jumpTo(undelayPosition(pos));
02091     updatePosition();
02092   }
02093 
02094   virtual void jumpToBegin() {
02095     this->origIterator->jumpToBegin();
02096     updatePosition();
02097   }
02098 
02099   virtual void iterateTo(const Argument& pos) {
02100     this->origIterator->iterateTo(undelayPosition(pos));
02101     updatePosition();
02102   }
02103 
02104   virtual void next() {
02105     this->origIterator->next();
02106     updatePosition();
02107   }
02108 
02109   virtual const Argument& getPosition() const {
02110     return position;
02111   }
02112 };
02113 
02121 typedef BaseDelayedIterator<FilteredConstMappingIterator, ConstMappingIterator> ConstDelayedMappingIterator;
02122 
02130 typedef BaseDelayedIterator<FilteredMappingIterator, MappingIterator> DelayedMappingIterator;
02131 
02139 template<class Base>
02140 class BaseDelayedMapping: public Base {
02141 protected:
02142   Base* mapping;
02143   simtime_t delay;
02144 
02145 
02146 protected:
02147   Argument delayPosition(const Argument& pos) const {
02148     Argument res(pos);
02149     res.setTime(res.getTime() - delay);
02150     return res;
02151   }
02152 
02153 public:
02154   BaseDelayedMapping(Base* mapping, simtime_t delay):
02155     Base(mapping->getDimensionSet()), mapping(mapping), delay(delay) {}
02156 
02157   virtual ~BaseDelayedMapping() {}
02158 
02159   virtual double getValue(const Argument& pos) const {
02160     return mapping->getValue(delayPosition(pos));
02161   }
02162 
02163   virtual ConstMappingIterator* createConstIterator() {
02164     return new ConstDelayedMappingIterator(mapping->createConstIterator(), delay);
02165   }
02166 
02167   virtual ConstMappingIterator* createConstIterator(const Argument& pos) {
02168     return new ConstDelayedMappingIterator(mapping->createConstIterator(delayPosition(pos)), delay);
02169   }
02170 
02174   virtual simtime_t getDelay() const {
02175     return delay;
02176   }
02177 
02181   virtual void delayMapping(simtime_t d) {
02182     delay = d;
02183   }
02184 };

02198     BaseDelayedMapping<ConstMapping>(mapping, delay) {}

02200   virtual ~ConstDelayedMapping() {}

02216 class DelayedMapping: public BaseDelayedMapping<Mapping> {
02217 public:

02219     BaseDelayedMapping<Mapping>(mapping, delay) {}
02220 
02221   virtual ~DelayedMapping() {}

02224     mapping->setValue(delayPosition(pos), value);
02225   }
02226

02228     return new DelayedMapping(mapping->clone(), delay);
02229   }
02230

02232     return new DelayedMappingIterator(mapping->createIterator(), delay);
02233   }
02234 
02235   virtual MappingIterator* createIterator(const Argument& pos) {
02236     return new DelayedMappingIterator(mapping->createIterator(delayPosition(pos)), delay);
02237   }
